name: Cleric and Goblins
description:
"Cleric and Goblins" is a hack-and-slash-like VR action game that features procedurally generated dungeons, a physics-based combat system, and item collection. The player's objective is to rescue the Cleric from the goblin-infested dungeon. Embark on an immersive adventure where your actions and decision-making skills will be put to the test. Be cautious of goblin traps, rescue the Cleric, and claim the finest loot!

■story

As you wake up, you find yourself in an unfamiliar forest. Confused and sitting down, a mysterious cleric girl passes by. She is a traveling cleric and offers to guide you from this mysterious forest to a nearby town. You feel relieved and safely reach the town with her help. Upon arrival, she hands you a small amount of money and a self-defense knife before departing.
A few days later, you learn that Cleric has been kidnapped by goblins. Determined to rescue her, you take the self-defense knife she gave you and venture into the dungeon.

■features

  • This game features infinitely generated dungeons, allowing you to challenge your limits or enjoy it at your preferred difficulty level—it's up to you.
  • There are dozens of different weapons in this game, providing an element of enjoyment in repeatedly attempting dungeons to collect rare weapons.
  • The game employs a physics-based combat system, enabling various actions such as stabbing and slashing enemies with sharp weapons, knocking them away with heavy weapons, punching and kicking foes, rolling weapons to trip enemies, grabbing and throwing them into the abyss, and more.
  • Despite being timid and clumsy, the Cleric will wholeheartedly support your battles. It reacts sensitively to your gaze, hand movements, and physical contact, providing an immersive experience as if it were a real presence.

■Convenient Features for Game Commentary

This game, comes with a variety of features aimed at making game commentary more convenient.
    []You can import avatars in VRM format and play using them.[]The game includes a feature to display YouTube comments within the game space.[]You can utilize a recording camera, offering various shooting modes like an automatic multi-angle function to effectively enhance your gameplay presentation.[]With sufficient PC specs, it's possible to output the recording camera footage in higher quality visuals.
